fields.Title of Presentation: <span>Rewriting Institutional Narratives of Scarcity through Contingent Leadership of Writing Programs</span>
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: Conference on College Composition and Communication
fields.Description/Abstract: <p><span style="font-weight:400;">Inspired by Fujikane’s (2019) rejection of “state forms of mapping,” this presentation examines potential advantages of leading writing programs from contingent leadership positions as a means of regaining control of an institutional narrative of scarcity through a process of mapping one program’s history and culture through both individual and collective stories that honor the human experience.</span></p>
